About

In a business landscape where an information breach can cripple a company, or wreak havoc on personal assets and livelihood, keeping information systems secure is paramount. As a boutique security company, Untamed Theory provides a competitive edge for helping our clients solidify their security posture.


We execute real world Attack Simulations, giving our clients an insight into how an adversary may actually compromise their organization. Additionally, we leverage the information gained from attacking to provide a well founded defensive remediation strategy for our clients.


With a broad range of experience from healthcare and software development companies, to the military defense industry, Untamed Theory brings a tailored approach to security that is right for your organization.
